ENTRY.SYNOPSIS: Broken power law, two break energies. XSpec model.

DESC.PARA: A three-segment broken power law (i.e. with two break energies).

PARA.EQUATION: A(E)= Kbreake1^(phoindx2-phoindx1) * (E/1keV)^-phoindx2 for breake1 <= E <= breake2

DESC.PARA: This is an additive model component.

ROW.DATA: power law photon index for E < E_break,1
first break point for the energy, keV
power law photon index for E_break,1 < E < E_break,2
second break point for the energy, keV
power law photon index for E > E_break,2

DESC.PARA: This information is taken from the XSpec User's Guide. Version 12.7 of the XSpec models is supplied with CIAO 4.4.

BUGS.PARA: For a list of known bugs and issues with the XSPEC models, please visit the XSPEC bugs page.
